item.title: ‘Happy Gilmore 2’ Review: Adam Sandler Tees Off a Happy Orgy of Raucous Fan-Service Nostalgia
item.description: It’s the genuine article, a true revival of Sandler’s Jerry Lewis-meets-rock ’n’ roll rage. A sequel to his fabled 1996 golf comedy, it extends that movie’s anarchy-on-the-putting-green spirit as blit
